title: Zoku Slush And Shake Maker
description:
Product Description:

Make slushies or milkshakes on your countertop in minutes with this specially desgined Zoku Cup. Just place the inner core in the freezer for at least 8 hours, then pour in your liquid and stir - your beverage freezes is now right before your eyes. with Zoku, you can stir up all kinds of cool treats like fruit smoothies, chocolate milk, iced coffee and root beer floats!


Features
Create healthy slushies and milkshakes in as little as 7 minutes
Inner Core stores in freezer
Outer sleeve keep hands from getting cold
Include a specially shaped slush spoon
BPA and phthalate free
Color: Red, Blue, Green, Purple, Orange

asset.author: How Store
asset.hookText:
More info: http://goo.gl/XpFSxi

Just place the inner core in the freezer for at least 8 hours, then pour in your liquid and stir - your beverage freezes is now right before your eyes. with Zoku, you can stir up all kinds of cool treats like fruit smoothies, chocolate milk, iced coffee and root beer floats!

transcripts: Create healthy slushies and milkshakes in as little as seven minutes with the Zoku Slush and Shake Maker. Here's how it works. Place the inner core in the freezer. This can be stored in the freezer so it's ready to go when ever you want to make a tasty treat. Pour in the liquid. Chocolate milk if you want a frozen milkshake or any type a juice for a healthy slush. Mix and enjoy. You can make up to two 8 ounce slushies before and eating to refreeze the core. It's also perfect for making treats for the kids. The Zoku slush and shake maker comes with the inner freezer core and protective outer cup to keep hands from getting cold, especially designed spoon for optimal scooping, recipe ideas, and instructions. Zoku. Make slushies and milkshakes fast.
